metadata.titleEn: In-situ water quality parameters of the lakes on the Tibetan Plateau (2009-2020)
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原湖泊水质实测数据（2009-2020）
metadata.description: This dataset provides the in-situ lake water parameters of 124 closed lakes with a total lake area of 24,570 km2, occupying 53% of the total lake area of the TP.These in-situ water quality parameters include water temperature, salinity, pH,chlorophyll-a concentration, blue-green algae (BGA) concentration, turbidity, dissolved oxygen (DO), fluorescent dissolved organic matter (fDOM), and water clarity of Secchi Depth (SD).
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集提供青藏高原124个湖泊实测水质参数，湖泊总面积为24,570 平方千米，占青藏高原湖泊总面积的53% 。实测湖泊水质参数包括水温、盐度、pH、叶绿素a浓度、蓝绿藻（BGA）浓度、浊度、溶解氧（DO）、荧光溶解有机物（fDOM）和水体透明度（SD）。测量方法中，盐度使用电导率是传感器测量获得的比电导率（SpC）转换得到，叶绿素a和蓝绿藻（BGA）浓度使用总藻类荧光传感器测量，温度使用温度传感器测量，pH使用pH传感器测量，溶解氧（DO）使用光学溶解氧传感器测量，fDOM使用荧光传感器测量，单位是硫酸奎宁单位（QSU），浊度使用浊度传感器测量，以Formazin比浊法为单位（FNU）。上述传感器测量获取的参数均使用YSIEXO或HACH多参数水质仪测量，测量时，传感器位于湖面以下约10-20厘米处。湖泊水体透明度使用塞氏盘测量法进行测量。
metadata.instructions:
The name of the file is "measured water quality data of lakes in Qinghai Tibet Plateau. Docx".
Data reading mode: the files in the data set can be directly opened by office program.
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件的名称为“In-situ water quality parameters of the lakes on the Tibetan Plateau.docx”。
数据读取方式：该数据集中的文件可以直接用office程序打开。

In-situ water quality investigation of the lakes on the Tibetan Plateau,Science Bulletin, ISSN 2095-9273,https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scib.2021.04.024.

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of methods used to measure water quality parameters in lakes on the Tibetan Plateau?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 测量藏族高原湖泊水质参数的方法的特点是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: salinity derived from specific conductance, chlorophyll-a and blue-green algae concentrations measured with total algae fluorescence, temperature measured with temperature sensors, pH measured with pH sensors, dissolved oxygen measured with optical dissolved oxygen sensors, fluorescent dissolved organic matter measured in quinine sulfate units, turbidity measured in Formazin Nephelometric Units, lake water transparency measured with a Secchi disk, sensors positioned 10-20 centimeters below the lake surface
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 盐度由比电导率、叶绿素-a 和蓝绿藻浓度（通过总藻类荧光测量）、温度（通过温度传感器测量）、pH 值（通过 pH 传感器测量）、溶解氧（通过光学溶解氧传感器测量）、荧光溶解有机物（以奎宁硫酸盐单位测量）、浊度（以福尔马肼浊度单位测量）、湖水透明度（通过 Secchi 盘测量）推导得出，传感器放置在湖面下10-20厘米处。

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the total area covered by the lakes on the Tibetan Plateau included in a dataset focused on water quality parameters?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在一个专注于水质参数的数据集中，青藏高原上湖泊覆盖的总面积是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the method for measuring salinity in lake water quality studies on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在青藏高原的湖泊水质研究中，测量盐度的方法是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Salinity is measured using conductivity sensors, which provide specific conductance (SpC) that is then converted to salinity.
Definition.AnswerCn: 盐度是通过电导率传感器测量的，这些传感器提供特定电导率（SpC），然后将其转换为盐度。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods for measuring chlorophyll a concentration using total algae fluorescence sensors compare to those for measuring blue-green algae concentration in terms of accuracy and applicability in lakes of the Tibetan Plateau?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用总藻类荧光传感器测量叶绿素a浓度的方法与测量蓝绿藻浓度的方法在准确性和在青藏 Plateau 湖泊中的适用性方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both chlorophyll a and blue-green algae concentrations are measured using total algae fluorescence sensors. These sensors are part of multi-parameter water quality instruments like YSIEXO or HACH, which are submerged 10-20 centimeters below the lake surface. The comparison in terms of accuracy and applicability would depend on the specific sensor calibration and environmental conditions, but both measurements utilize similar technologies and principles.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 叶绿素a和蓝绿藻浓度是通过总藻类荧光传感器进行测量的。这些传感器是多参数水质仪器的一部分，如YSIEXO或HACH，通常浸没在湖面下10-20厘米处。准确性和适用性的比较将取决于具体的传感器校准和环境条件，但这两种测量都利用了类似的技术和原理。
